title: Pump Station Optimization
description: An operator needs to optimize the run times for pumps in the water distribution network to minimize energy costs while maintaining required water pressure.

tasks.description: Retrieve the electricity Time-of-Use (TOU) rate schedule.
tasks.expected_outcome: System gets the on-peak and off-peak electricity prices.

tasks.description: Get the 24-hour water demand forecast for the service area.
tasks.expected_outcome: System retrieves the hourly water demand forecast.

tasks.description: Generate an optimal pump schedule that prioritizes running pumps during off-peak electricity hours to fill storage tanks.
tasks.expected_outcome: System creates a 24-hour schedule for each pump station.
